meanings.definition: To have or use something in common with others.
meanings.sent1: We shared our toys during playtime.
meanings.sent2: The siblings shared a bedroom growing up.
meanings.sent3: The friends shared a secret handshake.
meanings.sent4: The community shared a bond that could not be broken.
meanings.sent5: The team shared a victory celebration after the game.

meanings.definition: To divide or distribute something among multiple people.
meanings.sent1: Let's share the cake equally among us.
meanings.sent2: The teacher shared the crayons among the students.
meanings.sent3: The group shared the workload for the project.
meanings.sent4: The company shared the profits with its employees.
meanings.sent5: The family shared the chores to help each other out.

meanings.definition: To participate in or contribute to something with others.
meanings.sent1: We shared our ideas during the brainstorming session.
meanings.sent2: The volunteers shared their time to help the community.
meanings.sent3: The team shared the responsibility of organizing the event.
meanings.sent4: The students shared their knowledge with each other.
meanings.sent5: The neighbors shared a potluck dinner to celebrate.
